title: raybucks
author: raybucks
content: We all know steve jobs's strictness , also elon musk is very strict towards his employeesAnd richard branson cares his staffs and appreciate people's work I am confused in that which leadership qualities is good for bussiness or companystrictness like elon musk  or care like richard branson

comments.author: Car52
comments.body: Elon is vey strict about his work...

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Elon is a good  and very strict about maintaining a discipline. So I appreciate his work about maintaining discipline.
